title: Tahm Kench Pronounciation

replies.body:
Tahm's Lead designer Daniel Klein [tweeted out](https://twitter.com/danielzklein/status/613556157748113408) a clip of him saying his name:
http://picosong.com/gJmb/
Basically say it as tom

> [{quoted}](name=shinijumanjiman,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=mjTu9VYf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-24T13:22:47.705+0000)
>
> Tahm's Lead designer Daniel Klein [tweeted out](https://twitter.com/danielzklein/status/613556157748113408) a clip of him saying his name:
> http://picosong.com/gJmb/
> Basically say it as tom

Maybe it's my accent, but I hear that as Tam. :)  
However, I'd definitely suggest everyone go by what it is they hear Daniel saying.
Actually I'd say it sounds more like Tahm,the a is just a bit drawn out.
Yeah, I hear it as Tom Kench too. Thanks for sharing that!
Well the 'ah' is pretty much always used to denote the long 'a' sound as in 'mom' or 'tom', so I'm pretty certain it's Tom.
It's always going to be Tah-m for me even if someone says it's tam/tom
nope, im gonna pronouce it like tam cantch
Answer is A, confirmed by Zenon on the reveal thread that Tahm is pronounced like Tom or Mom.
